thread.section_title: Hotel Atmospheres - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Style and savoire faire
thread.title_full: Style and savoire faire - Review of Hotel Atmospheres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rosemary C
title: Style and savoire faire
text:
This hotel was in a great location, easy walking distance to Notre Dame, longer to the Louvre, a few blocks to the Pantheon and Sorbonne. Many patisseries and restaurants are nearby. Rooms are chic, small / average, sparkling clean with fine linens and comfortable beds.
Best of all was the staff who accommodated every request above expectations and seemed to enjoy doing so. They are all fluent in English and have senses of humor, full of fun!
